articles.description: The 60-year-old man charged with the murder of rapper Tupac Shakur plead not guilty in Las Vegas court Thursday.
articles.content:
The 60-year-old man charged with the killing of rapper Tupac Shakur pleaded not guilty in Las Vegas court Thursday.
